com.myronmarston.music
Class NoteList

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<Note>
          com.myronmarston.music.NoteList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Note>, java.util.Collection<Note>, java.util.List<Note>
public class NoteList
extends java.util.AbstractList<Note>
implements java.lang.Cloneable

NoteList contains a sequence of notes.

Field Detail

REGEX_STRING

public static final java.lang.String REGEX_STRING
Regular expression strng for matching and parsing note list strings. (?=.*?[A-G]) is a look ahead assertion to make sure there is at least one non-rest in the note list.

REGEX_PATTERN

public static final java.util.regex.Pattern REGEX_PATTERN
Regular expression pattern for matching and parsing note list strings.

parseNoteListString

public static NoteList parseNoteListString(java.lang.String noteListString,
                                           Scale scale)
                                    throws NoteStringParseException
Creates a new note list based on the given note list string.

Parameters:
noteListString - string containing space-seperated notes, each of the form 'F#4,1/4,PP'
scale - the scale to use to determine the note's pitch information
Returns:
the new note list
Throws:
NoteStringParseException - thrown if the note list string is invalid

getListWithNormalizedRests

public NoteList getListWithNormalizedRests()
Gets a list of notes with all rests normalized. Adjacent rests are combined into one longer rest.

Returns:
list of notes with normalized rests

updateScale

public void updateScale(Scale scale)
Updates the scale on all the notes. This should only be called when you know that all the notes of this note list have the same note list.

Parameters:
scale - the new scale for the notes

getNumberOfAccidentals

public int getNumberOfAccidentals()
Gets the number of notes that have chromatic adjustements.

Returns:
the number of notes with chromatic adjustments

setSourceVoiceSectionOnAllNotes

public void setSourceVoiceSectionOnAllNotes(VoiceSection source)
Sets the sourceVoiceSection field on all notes of this note list to the given one.

Parameters:
source - the voice section that generated the notes in this note list

setfirstNotesOfGermCopy

public void setfirstNotesOfGermCopy(int... indices)
Sets which notes have the firstNoteOfGermCopy flag set to true. The notes of the indices given will have this set to true; all others will be set to false. This is not intended to be used in production but is only provided as a convenience method for unit tests.

Parameters:
indices - list of indices of the notes that should be the first notes of a germ copy

getReadOnlyCopy

public NoteList getReadOnlyCopy()
Gets a read-only copy of this note list.

Returns:
a read-only copy
